global.unAuthorizedDesc: You do not have permission to view this page.
global.sessionTimeOutDesc: Extend your session or sign out from application in {{seconds}}
global.maxFileSize: File size should not exceed 20 MB.

addUser.deleteUserModalDesc: Confirm that you are wish to delete the following record
addUser.name: First and last name
addUser.title: Title

integration.title: Integration
integration.jiraDesc: Atlassian issue tracking and project management software
integration.outlookDesc: Personal information manager and email application developed by Microsoft
integration.integrationErrorDesc: Failed to connect with {{channel}}. Please check your settings and try again. If the problem persists, contact support for assistance.
integration.integrationSuccessDesc: You have successfully connected with {{channel}}! Your integration is now complete, and you can start working with {{channel}} seamlessly.
integration.disconnectConfirmationModalDesc: Are you sure you want to disconnect the {{channel}} integration? This action cannot be undone and may affect your workflow and linked issues.
integration.connectConfirmationModalDesc: Are you sure you want to connect the {{channel}} integration? This action cannot be undone and may affect your workflow and linked issues.
integration.disconnectErrorDesc: Failed to disconnect {{channel}}. Please check your settings and try again. If the problem persists, contact support for assistance.

modals.deleteClaassDesc: Confirm that you are wish to delete the following record
modals.columnInsufficientDescription: The dataset must have at least 2 columns. Additionally, there needs to be at least one column designated as a data class and one column that is not a data class. Please adjust your dataset accordingly.
modals.classsesInsufficientDescription: The dataset must have at least 2 main classes in the class hierarchy
modals.createDatasetSucceessDesc: You have successfully created the dataset group. In the detailed view, you can now see and edit the dataset as needed.
modals.enableDatasetDesc: The dataset group cannot be enabled until data is added. Please add datasets to this group and try again.
modals.errorDesc: Something went wrong. Please try again.

detailedView.unsavedChangesWarning: You have made changes to the dataset which are not saved. Please save the changes to apply
detailedView.insufficientExamplesDesc: Insufficient examples - at least 10 examples are needed to activate the dataset group
detailedView.noDataDesc: You have created the dataset group, but there are no datasets available to show here. You can upload a dataset to view it in this space. Once added, you can edit or delete the data as needed.
detailedView.majorUpdateBanner: You have updated key configurations of the dataset schema which are not saved, please save to apply changes.  Any files imported or edits made to the existing data will be discarded after changes are applied
detailedView.minorUpdateBanner: You have imported new data into the dataset, please save the changes to apply. Any changes you made to the individual data items will be discarded after changes are applied
detailedView.patchUpdateBanner: You have edited individual items in the dataset which are not saved. Please save the changes to apply
detailedView.confirmMajorUpdatesDesc: Any files imported or edits made to the existing data will be discarded after changes are applied
detailedView.confirmMinorUpdatesDesc: Any changes you made to the individual data items (patch update) will be discarded after changes are applied
detailedView.confirmPatchUpdatesDesc: Changed data rows will be updated in the dataset
detailedView.patchDataUnsuccessfulDesc: Something went wrong. Please try again.
detailedView.exportDataSuccessDesc: Your data has been successfully exported.
detailedView.exportDataUnsucessDesc: Something went wrong. Please try again.
detailedView.importDataUnsucessDesc: Something went wrong. Please try again.
detailedView.validationInitiatedDesc: The dataset file was successfully uploaded. The validation and preprocessing is now initiated
detailedView.fieldNameError: {{name}} cannot be used as a field name
detailedView.fieldNameExist: {{name}} already exists as a field name

import.title: Import new data
import.uploadDesc: Uploading dataset. Please wait until the upload finishes. If you cancel midway, the data and progress will be lost.
import.invalidFileDesc: The uploaded file is not in the correct {{format}} format. Please upload a valid {{format}} file and try again.

export.title: Data export was successful
export.description: Your data has been successfully exported.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: Once you delete the dataset all models connected to this model will become untrainable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
delete.errorDesc: There was an issue deleting the dataset group. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support for assistance.

edit.title: Edit
edit.label: Label
edit.errorDesc: There was an issue updating the dataset group. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support for assistance.

upload.title: Data upload successful
upload.desc: The dataset file was successfully uploaded. Please save the changes to initiate data validation and preprocessing

datasetDelete.confirmationDesc: Confirm that you are wish to delete the following dataset
datasetDelete.successDesc: You have successfully deleted the dataset. The dataset is no longer available and all related data has been removed.

importModal.title: Import stop words
importModal.inprogressDesc: The import of stop words is currently in progress. Please wait until the process is complete.
importModal.successDesc: Your data has been successfully imported.

validationSessions.title: Validation Sessions
validationSessions.fail: Validation failed because {{class}} class found in the {{column}} column does not exist in hierarchy

correctedTexts.title: Corrected Texts
correctedTexts.exportSuccessDesc: Your data has been successfully exported.
correctedTexts.exportDataUnsucessDesc: Something went wrong. Please try again.

createDataModel.title: Create Data Model
createDataModel.replaceDesc: Adding this model to production will replace the current production model. Are you sure you want to proceed?
createDataModel.successTitle: Data Model Created and Started Training
createDataModel.successDesc: You have successfully created and started training the data model. You can view it on the data model dashboard.
createDataModel.errorDesc: There was an issue creating or training the data model. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support for assistance.
createDataModel.replaceWarning: {{platform}} integration is currently disabled, therefore the model wouldn't receive any inputs or make any predictions

configureDataModel.saveChangesDesc: You have successfully saved the changes. You can view the data model in the "All Data Models" view.
configureDataModel.updateErrorDesc: There was an issue updating the data model. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support for assistance.
configureDataModel.deleteErrorDesc: The model cannot be deleted because it is currently in production. Please escalate another model to production before proceeding to delete this model.
configureDataModel.deleteConfirmationDesc: Confirm that you are wish to delete the following data model
configureDataModel.deleteModalErrorDesc: There was an issue deleting the data model. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support for assistance.
configureDataModel.retrainDataModalErrorDesc: There was an issue retraining the data model. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support for assistance.
configureDataModel.title: Configure Data Model
configureDataModel.retrainCard: Model updated. Please initiate retraining to continue benefiting from the latest improvements.
configureDataModel.confirmRetrainDesc: Are you sure you want to retrain this model?

trainingSessions.title: Training Sessions
trainingSessions.fail: Validation failed because {{class}} class found in the {{column}} column does not exist in hierarchy
trainingSessions.noSessionsDesc: There are currently no active training sessions. Once you start a training session, it will appear here. In the meantime, you can initiate a new training session to begin improving your models.
